summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1581, for the improvement of Main Street (in what is commonly known as Hillman City) from Rainier Boulevard to Bateman Street, by grading and curbing the same, and constructing wooden sidewalks, and by planking the same to a width of twenty-four (24) feet, under Ordinance No. 16870, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
